description: This file defines a React component 'DeviceList' that displays a list of devices with features such as search, filtering, sorting, pagination, and delete functionality. It interacts with external APIs and components to manage device data and user interactions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches device data from the API, updates state variables for device list, total count, and pagination mode.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Handles device deletion, confirms user action, calls delete API, and reloads data.
